data.text:
The United States RF Inductors Consumption Market size is predicted to attain a valuation of USD 14.78 Billion in 2023, showing a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 7.81 percent from 2024 to 2031. Estimates place this value at USD 23.2 Billion by 2031.
